mapper.select: select count(*) from product where product_type = #{product_type}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum AS rn, product_code, PRODUCT_NAME, product_image, product_price, product_brand, product_option, product_explain, product_type FROM product WHERE product_type = #{product_type} ) WHERE rn BETWEEN (#{section}-1)*100 + (#{pageNum}-1)*10+1 AND (#{section}-1)*100+#{pageNum}*10

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum AS rn, lvl, review_num, review_parentNum, review_productId, review_userId, review_content, review_rate FROM (SELECT LEVEL AS lvl, review_num, review_parentNum, review_productId, review_userId, review_content, review_rate FROM review START WITH review_parentNum=0 CONNECT BY NOCYCLE PRIOR review_num = review_parentNum ORDER SIBLINGS BY review_num DESC)) WHERE review_productId =#{product_code} and rn BETWEEN (#{section}-1)*100 + (#{pageNum}-1)*10+1 AND (#{section}-1)*100+#{pageNum}*10
